Continue meeting with @EHRV-1, @ITPM-1, @CLINLEAD-1. Discuss potential solutions and data migration options. Obtain cost estimates and timelines for development and implementation. Discuss service level agreements (SLAs).

Share the meeting summary with @ITPM-1, @CLINLEAD-1, @DA-1, @HIS-1. Request feedback and input on the proposed solutions and timelines.
